statements: SELECT * FROM health_records WHERE patient_id = 100;
SELECT record_text FROM health_records WHERE provider_id = 200;
SELECT record_id, date_created FROM health_records WHERE provider_id = 300 ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT * FROM health_records WHERE patient_id = 200 AND provider_id = 300;
SELECT record_id, date_created, date_updated FROM health_records WHERE provider_id = 100 ORDER BY date_updated ASC;
SELECT * FROM health_records WHERE patient_id = 100 ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT record_id, provider_id, record_text FROM health_records WHERE provider_id IN (200, 201) ORDER BY date_updated ASC;
SELECT provider_id, COUNT(record_id) AS num_records FROM health_records GROUP BY provider_id HAVING COUNT(record_id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM health_records WHERE date_created >= '2021-01-01' AND date_created <= '2021-06-30' ORDER BY record_id ASC;
SELECT patient_id, MAX(date_updated) AS last_updated FROM health_records GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patient;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patient;
SELECT patient_name, address, phone_number FROM Patient ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecord WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT record_id, record_date, diagnosis FROM MedicalRecord ORDER BY record_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patient WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, address FROM Patient WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patient JOIN MedicalRecord ON Patient.patient_id = MedicalRecord.patient_id WHERE MedicalRecord.diagnosis = 'Flu';
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecord WHERE record_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients FROM Patient;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, dob, gender FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_id, name, location FROM patients ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, dob, gender FROM patients WHERE dob BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%COVID%';
SELECT name, gender, dob FROM patients WHERE location='New York';
SELECT patient_id, name, dob, location FROM patients ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients p JOIN medical_records m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id WHERE m.diagnosis='COVID-19';

SELECT p.name AS patient_name, d.name AS doctor_name, m.diagnosis, m.prescription FROM patients p JOIN medical_records m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id JOIN doctors d ON m.doctor_id = d.doctor_id WHERE d.specialization='Cardiology';

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients, d.specialization FROM medical_records m JOIN doctors d ON m.doctor_id = d.doctor_id GROUP BY d.specialization HAVING total_patients > 2 ORDER BY total_patients DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, diagnosis_text FROM patients JOIN diagnoses ON patients.patient_id = diagnoses.patient_id;
SELECT provider_name, provider_type FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT p.first_name, d.diagnosis_text, t.treatment_name FROM patients p JOIN diagnoses d ON p.patient_id = d.patient_id JOIN treatments t ON p.patient_id = t.patient_id;
SELECT h.provider_name, h.provider_type, p.first_name, p.last_name FROM healthcare_providers h JOIN patients p ON h.provider_address = p.address;
SELECT COUNT(*), p.first_name, p.last_name FROM patients p JOIN diagnoses d ON p.patient_id = d.patient_id GROUP BY p.patient_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM Patients;
SELECT record_id, diagnosis FROM MedicalRecords WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, full_name, date_of_visit FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id ORDER BY date_of_visit ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY full_name DESC, date_of_birth
SELECT provider_name, specialty, address FROM Providers WHERE address LIKE '%Ave' OR address LIKE '%Street'
SELECT appointment_id, reason, status FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_date
SELECT full_name, address, phone_number FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id
SELECT provider_name, specialty, phone_number FROM Providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology'
